themes.title: Data Management Best Practices
themes.description: Comprehensive framework for establishing data governance, quality standards, and management processes across organizations. This project focuses on creating scalable, repeatable patterns for data stewardship.

artifacts.title: Data Governance Framework
artifacts.description: Complete documentation of governance structures, roles, and responsibilities

artifacts.title: Data Quality Standards
artifacts.description: Defined metrics, thresholds, and validation rules for data quality assessment

artifacts.title: Implementation Phase 1
artifacts.description: Initial rollout and pilot program results

artifacts.title: Best Practices Playbook
artifacts.description: Practical guide with examples and templates for common scenarios

themes.title: Data Science
themes.description: Advanced analytics and machine learning projects focused on extracting insights from complex datasets. Includes predictive modeling, statistical analysis, and data visualization initiatives.

artifacts.title: Predictive Model: Customer Churn
artifacts.description: Machine learning model for predicting customer churn with 85% accuracy

artifacts.title: Data Pipeline Architecture
artifacts.description: ETL pipeline design for real-time data processing

artifacts.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
artifacts.description: Comprehensive EDA report with visualizations and key findings

themes.title: Agentic Workflow
themes.description: Design and implementation of autonomous agent systems for automating complex workflows. Focus on multi-agent coordination, task orchestration, and intelligent decision-making.

artifacts.title: Agent Architecture Design
artifacts.description: System architecture for multi-agent workflow orchestration

artifacts.title: Workflow Engine Prototype
artifacts.description: Proof of concept implementation with core orchestration capabilities

artifacts.title: Agent Communication Protocol
artifacts.description: Specification for inter-agent messaging and coordination

artifacts.title: Pilot Implementation
artifacts.description: First production deployment and initial results

themes.title: Customer Success Score
themes.description: Development of a comprehensive scoring system to measure and predict customer success. Combines behavioral analytics, engagement metrics, and predictive modeling to provide actionable insights.

artifacts.title: Scoring Algorithm
artifacts.description: Core algorithm for calculating customer success scores

artifacts.title: Dashboard Design
artifacts.description: User interface and visualization design for score monitoring

artifacts.title: Validation Study
artifacts.description: Analysis of score accuracy and predictive power

artifacts.title: Integration Phase
artifacts.description: Integration with existing CRM and analytics platforms
